ai_lite_scenarios.description: Test with opportunities that closely match organization mission
ai_lite_scenarios.expected_outcome: High compatibility scores, immediate action priorities

ai_lite_scenarios.description: Test with mix of high, medium, and low alignment opportunities
Test with competitive or complex opportunities
ai_lite_scenarios.expected_outcome: Lower confidence scores, detailed risk assessments

ai_lite_scenarios.description: Test scoring consistency across different funding levels
ai_lite_scenarios.expected_outcome: Funding amount should not bias compatibility scoring

ai_heavy_scenarios.description: Test with long-term strategic partnership potential
Test with highly competitive major foundation
Test with known board member connections
Test with opportunity having extensive application process
ai_heavy_scenarios.expected_outcome: Detailed grant application intelligence with LOE estimates
